alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 10:44PM AKST until December 23 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Baranof Island, including Sitka and Port Alexander. Western Prince of Wales Island, including Edna Bay, Klawock, Craig, and Hydaburg. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dry snow will accumulate quickly with snowfall rates as high as an inch per hour. There will be a stark line between areas with snow and areas without snow. Some guidance has kept snow offshore of Prince of Wales Island, thus confidence is not as high on Prince of Wales Island as for Baranof Island.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
